document.full_text: osama bin laden and his comrades offered no resistance when killed by u.s. special forces in a pakistani town, pakistani security officials said on thursday.
document.title: no resistance in "cold-blooded" u.s. raid: pakistan officials
lines_and_colors: osama bin laden and his comrades offered no resistance when killed by u.s. special forces in a pakistani town, pakistani security officials said on thursday.
